EmailTemplate.name: 201902_Q2PriceUpdate_LG.201902_Q2PriceUpdate_email
EmailTemplate.subject: Updated Spares Pricing Effective April 1, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear Customer, Honeywell will update our spares, repair & overhaul (R&O) universal flat rate (UFR), and Spares Exchange Program (SPEX) pricing on select parts effective April 1, 2019. To view the impacted part numbers, access the MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/m000Z720h0rGlqEzINs0QX0]]> pricing catalog and filter on the ‘revised list price effective date’ of April 1, 2019.
To prevent order disruptions, please take the following actions:
- Access updated pricing on the Honeywell MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/m000Z720h0rGlqEzINs0QX0]]> Portal, EDI interfaces, and downloadable spares, UFR, & SPEX catalog files by March 1, 2019. - Review the new pricing and apply it to all new purchase orders created on or after April 1, 2019. - Update your pricing system with the new pricing information.
The MyAerospace Portal <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/o02tZ008N00lEQ0hzXIGrq0]]> is always available for your order management needs, including parts quoting, ordering, and tracking. View MyAerospace updates and tutorials here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/I0l0uQz0qhE9ZG2r0N0IX00]]>.
To stay in the loop with us, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to confirm that you agree to receive all forms of e-communications such as e-mail, social media and digital advertising.
If you have any questions, please contact your Honeywell business focal.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/hq0pk0I00Q0000GnZ020XI0]]>
